Programming a blockchain

Learn the basic components by building one yourself.

For Python programmers

  1. Let’s Build the Tiniest Blockchain In Less Than 50 Lines of Python Part 1 - by Gerald Nas - Jul, 2017

  2. Let’s Make the Tiniest Blockchain Bigger Part 2 - by Gerald Nas - Jul, 2017

  3. Learn Blockchains by Building One - by Daniel van Flymen - Sep, 2017

  4. A Practical Introduction to Blockchain with Python - by Adil Moujahid - March 2018

For Js programmer

  1. Writing a tiny blockchain in JavaScript Series - by Xavier Decuyper - Jul 2017

  2. Build your own blockchain - by Nam Chu Hoai - Nov 2018
